lead_paragraph: Denard Span is all-too-familiar with what the Giants are capable of accomplishing come October having lost in the Division Series to San Francisco in 2014.

headline.print_headline: Denard Span Fills Holes at Leadoff Outfield for Giants
headline.main: Denard Span Fills Holes at Leadoff Outfield for Giants
